title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 202.14 - Special masters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 202.14 - Special masters

State Regulations

The Chief Administrator of the Courts may
authorize the creation of a program for the appointment of attorneys as special
masters in designated courts to preside over conferences and hear and report on
applications to the court. Special masters shall serve without
compensation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
202.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
